1636290.name: Star Conflict - Galactic tour. Stage one
1636290.description:
Attention! Identical packs can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Access to additional rewards in the event “Galactic tour. Stage one”.
  • Upon receipt, the next level is immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available
  • 7 days of premium license.

To get the reward, you need to unlock the desired stage. In order to gain access to the next reward you need to go through all the previous stages.

Read more about the event on the project’s official website.
1636290.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 波兰语, 匈牙利语, 捷克语, 乌克兰语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
